hero_title: Turn Healthcare Data Into Real-Time Clinical Intelligence
hero_content:
The infrastructure platform that deploys AI applications securely with native MCP and AI coding support.

Works across Epic, Cerner, and ancillary systems to transform clinical AI research into production deployments.
clients_title: Proven at Duke, Emory, and 14+ Tier 1 Health Systems
quote_content: This is a game changer for clinical AI research. The platform's seamless integration with our existing systems and secure deployment capabilities have transformed how we bring AI innovations to patient care.
